articles.title: Testing for Agility
articles.abstract: Ken Schwaber, Qumer and Henderson-Sellers, and others, have created methods of measuring an organization's Agility. Here, inspired by their work, I have distilled some simple test cases for Agility. Removing the complexities of grading rubrics, a team simply passes or fails each test case - something all of us Quality Engineers can appreciate.
